attributes.action: work to convince the Engineering Design Dept Secretary to take the informal coffee mornings in Engineering Manager's absence in the future.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the absence of the appropriate authority figure, we the undersigned feel that these informal meetings are an essential part of the working practices of our company and feel that the Engineering Design Dept Secretary (the font of all knowledge) should take these meetings so we have an oppotunity to have our burning comany-related questions answered.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
